TopicTitle: The 0.26 Waiting room (it came sooner then you all expected)

Articles.Content:
This has to be made sooner or later, why not now?

With this, we experience hype from the very beginning!
Can't wait for biomes on all planets!!! I hope it's released soon.
There are 3 legendary kerbals. Jeb is illuminati. 3-1=2. 25+2=27. KSP 0.27 confirmed?
Dude, way too early for this. It's gonna get locked.

inb4 inevitable thread lock. I officially support the existence of such a thread, even if early, so that people don't go making 35 other threads.

But then again, they probably will anyway :\
